import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const App = () => { const course = 'Half Stack application development' const part1 = 'Fundamentals of React' const exercises1 = 10 const part2 = 'Using props to pass data' const exercises2 = 7 const part3 = 'State of a component' const exercises3 = 14 const excersises = [exercises1,exercises2,exercises3]; return (

Header course={course}

) } ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root'))
